## Accessible Bar Plot with MAIDR

This notebook demonstrates how to use the MAIDR R binder in a Shiny notebook to display an accessible bar plot.

```{r}
data <- data.frame(
  Species = c("Adelie", "Chinstrap", "Gentoo"),
  BodyMass = c(3700.66, 3733.09, 5076.02)
)

plot_obj <- ggplot(data, aes(x = Species, y = BodyMass)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "Average Body Mass by Species", x = "Species", y = "Body Mass (g)")

maidr_display_plot(plot_obj)
```
